meanings.sent1: The extemporary speech was delivered confidently.
meanings.sent2: She gave an extemporary response to the unexpected question.
meanings.sent3: His extemporary jokes kept the audience entertained.
meanings.sent4: The extemporary decision to take a different route proved to be wise.
meanings.sent5: The extemporary dance performance left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: Improvised or done on the spot
meanings.sent1: The extemporary play was a hit with the audience.
meanings.sent2: He came up with an extemporary solution to the problem.
meanings.sent3: Their extemporary decision to have a picnic in the rain was adventurous.
meanings.sent4: The extemporary art created by the street artist was captivating.
meanings.sent5: The extemporary decision to change the menu delighted the customers.
